step_original: Certificate of authenticity: Certificate of authenticity B Basmati Rice for export to the European Community
step_description:
You must have a basmati rice certificate of authenticity from India or Pakistan, issued by either:
- Export Inspection Council, Ministry of Commerce, India
- Trading Corporation of Pakistan (Pvt) Ltd
xstep_howto_description:
You may only declare this commodity code with presentation of a certificate of authenticity from India or Pakistan, issued by a competent body in the exporting country

  • From India - Export Inspection Council (Ministry of Commerce, Government of India)
  • From Pakistan - Trading Corporation of Pakistan (Pvt) Ltd
